This app is created as part of the requirement for the Coursera Data Science Capstone Course.

The project builds a predictive text model combined with a shiny app UI that will predict the next word or autocomplete as the user types a phrase. This is similar to the way most smart phone keyboards are implemented today using the technology of Swiftkey.

In the top right you can click **Show Below** to get more room for the app. It will display at the bottom.
